title: What do the names of bestselling Steam games have in common? Words like Manager, Tycoon, Remastered, and HD
description: Check out my new game, Tycoon Manager HD Pro.

title: Starfield player stuffs thousands of potatoes into a room to marvel at how much better Bethesda's physics have gotten
description: This will surely be the first of many item spill space simulations.

title: Starfield's randomization, explained: what will be the same for every player, and what won't
description: The features of the planets you explore and the loot you find will often be different from what everyone else experiences.

title: Starfield errors like 'you're too early' expected at launch, Microsoft says 'please be patient'
description: Heads-up that you might get a message like "do you own this game or app?" or "are you too early?" when trying to launch Starfield today.

title: Stray is being made into an animated film that Annapurna hopes will be 'the first and greatest hopepunk movie that's ever been made'
description: Studio executives say Stray is getting the movie treatment because "it is just wildly popular."

title: Starfield player builds ungodly spaceship entirely out of hallways: 'I was bored with quests and decided to dedicate time to this'
description: I'm sure it handles like a dream.

title: Stardew Valley creator ignites new fan theories with five simple words: 'Here's a Haunted Chocolatier screen'
description: Eric Barone says he has lots more images from his new game to share, but right now he's focused on Stardew Valley 1.6.

title: If you're not having sex in Starfield daily, you're missing out on a massive XP buff
description: The "Emotional Security" buff is one of Starfield's best, and true love is the only way to get it.

title: Three men arrested for stealing thousands of dollars by hacking into ATMs with a Raspberry Pi device
description: The thieves were seen stealing over $5,000 from a single ATM.

title: The new Baldur's Gate 3 hotfix brings proper romance to the game's most evil companion
description: Hotfix 5 is live, with good news for Minthara lovers.

title: How to complete First Contact in Starfield
description: Decide the colonist's fate in this Fallout-style quest.

title: Classic Bethesda bug sees Starfield crew members riding on the outside of your ship in deep space
description: Just chilling. Literally.

title: Guys, someone trapped Sonic the Hedgehog inside a controller
description: PDP's new controllers have 'collectible figurines' you can't collect without smashing the controller.

title: Swen Vincke says Baldur's Gate 3 devs created Karlach's new epilogue after post-launch feedback, with actress recording new lines 'within the week'
description: 'You can't do cool stuff in a silo'

title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor continues its long road to redemption with a patch that brings DLSS support and good old 'Various bug fixes'
description: What fixes are they? Never you mind.

title: Overcrowded October forces another big-name game delay all the way into 2024
description: THQ Nordic wants a little more space for its Alone in the Dark reboot to breathe.

title: Legend has spent years making Portal for the N64 and by Gaben he's done it
description: This guy is some sort of Nintendo Jedi.

title: Starfield's over-reliance on fast travel makes it feel tiny, but it's just part of a larger problem
description: You can visit new star systems at the touch of a button, but exploration takes a backseat.

title: Starfield has already got a 'potato mode' mod to help you run it on machines from 1969
description: Boil 'em, mash 'em, stick 'em in a spaceship.

title: Baldur's Gate 3: How to get Loviatar's blessing from Abdirak
description: Take it like a champ to get the goddess' boon.

title: Charles Martinet, former voice of Mario, isn't quite sure what being Mario Ambassador actually means: 'we’ll all learn exactly what that is'
description: Martinet commented on the role during a Q&A earlier this week.

title: Starfield's speedrunners are cooking already with a sub-3 hour run, teleporting punches, and cramming NPCs into file cabinets
description: Get in the filing cabinet, we're going speedrunning.

title: True to FromSoftware's creative vision, Armored Core 6 now has a mech that's CJ riding Thomas the Tank Engine
description: It's not an anthropomorphised fictional train. It's a meme.

title: A $5 Starfield mod to enable DLSS Frame Generation has been cracked to remove modder's DRM
description: Modder PureDark made the DLSS 2.0 version free but charged $5 for the Frame Gen compatible version via a Patreon subscription.

title: How to complete the Free the Artist quest in Baldur's Gate 3
description: Help Oskar Fevras and get yourself a pretty portrait.

title: Massive Baldur's Gate 3 mod adds playable kobolds, minotaurs, FF14 races, and D&D's rage-inducing kenders
description: You can finally be the Sword Coast's littlest guy.

title: Bethesda says most of Starfield's 1000+ planets are dull on purpose because 'When the astronauts went to the moon, there was nothing there' but 'they certainly weren't bored'
description: Exploring is supposed to be a reward in itself.

title: Starfield bug means you can just stroll up and take one of the best spacesuits right at the start of the game with no skill or repercussions
description: Grab the Mark I Spacesuit now

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #808: Tuesday, September 5
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.

title: NYT Connections puzzle hint and answer for Tuesday, September 5 (#86)
description: Our guide to help you find your way through the New York Time's puzzle on Tuesday.
